backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, registrations, OTP handling, and blob-based document storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping fixes and enhancements to specific frontend files and components with linked test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, their responsibilities, and recent functional updates.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component handling splash screen, view switching between registration and admin, and remounting registration flow.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen with reduced-motion support, auto-dismiss timing, and a skip button.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Admin panel handling authentication, registration list management, selection, editing, deletion, and detail viewing.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: A UI card offering admin access recovery via setup code or username/password, showing identity diagnostics and handling form submissions with loading and error states.
An error boundary that catches rendering errors in registration detail views and displays a recovery panel with troubleshooting steps and a retry option.
An error boundary for the entire admin panel that shows a full‑screen error card with retry and page refresh options.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/D: Component that loads and displays a document image via direct URL with loading, error handling, and retry support, plus a placeholder variant.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/E: A form for editing registration fields such as category, payment method, and router, supporting change detection and update mutation feedback.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/R: Displays detailed customer registration info with loading, error, empty, and selection states, along with document previews, edit actions, and deletion flow.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAdm: Provides a React Query mutation for admin password login with backend error normalization and admin-related cache invalidation.
Defines queries and mutations for checking admin status, managing registrations, and performing optimistic updates via the backend actor.
Implements a mutation to apply an admin setup code, storing it, reinitializing the actor, and refreshing admin-related queries with error normalization.
frontend/src/features/admin/utils/regist: Utility functions for formatting registration data, validating missing fields, accessing documents, and generating display names.
frontend/src/features/registration/compo: Error boundary component that catches step errors and displays a recovery UI with technical details and a refresh option.
frontend/src/features/registration/hooks: Custom hook detecting double‑click/tap interactions and showing a hint before triggering a callback.
Defines React Query mutations for generating and verifying OTPs and submitting registration data, including converting uploaded files into ExternalBlob objects.
frontend/src/features/registration/Regis: Manages the multi‑step customer registration workflow, including step navigation, validation, and hidden double‑interaction admin access.
frontend/src/features/registration/steps: Renders the customer details form and reports validation state upward while tracking field changes and validation differences.
Handles OTP generation, verification, and triggers registration submission once OTP is validated.
Displays terms, manages acceptance state, timestamps acceptance, and provides a sanitized print flow for proof of acceptance.
Allows users to upload Aadhaar, PAN, and optional payment receipt files, producing previews and validating required documents.
frontend/src/features/registration/terms: Exports static terms and conditions grouped into router and service sections.
frontend/src/features/registration/types: Defines TypeScript interfaces for customer details, document uploads, and step props used throughout the registration flow.
frontend/src/features/registration/valid: Validates customer details fields including phone, DOB, email, and address, returning error messages per field.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor based on identity, handling anonymous mode, access control initialization, and dependent query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and status states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, color variables, dark mode themes, and custom styles for splash screen and admin panel UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for parsing URL parameters, storing sensitive params in sessionStorage, sanitizing URLs, and restoring them.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with custom design tokens.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including requirements, architectural notes, existing features, and known issues for the app.
